description.brazilian: Você finalmente zarpou para Teer Fradee
description.english: You have finally taken the path to Teer Fradee
description.french: Vous avez enfin pris la route pour Teer Fradee
description.german: Du bist endlich nach Teer Fradee aufgebrochen.
description.italian: Hai finalmente preso la strada per Teer Fradee
description.polish: Udało ci się wyruszyć na Teer Fradee
description.schinese: 你终于踏上了通往Teer Fradee的路
description.spanish: Por fin has emprendido la travesía a Teer Fradee

description.brazilian: Você descobriu o segredo da Congregação e suas origens
description.english: You have discovered the secret of the Congregation and your origins
description.french: Vous avez découvert le secret de la Congrégation et de vos origines
description.german: Du hast das Geheimnis der Kongregation und deiner Herkunft enthüllt.
description.italian: Hai scoperto il segreto della Congregazione e le tue origini
description.polish: Udało ci się odkryć sekret Kongregacji i swojego pochodzenia
description.schinese: 你发现了商团的秘密以及自己的身世
description.spanish: Has descubierto el secreto de la Congregación y tus orígenes

description.brazilian: Você evitou o golpe da Guarda da Moeda
description.english: You prevented the Coin Guard from attempting a coup
description.french: Vous avez empêché la garder du Denier de tenter un coup d'état
description.german: Du hast den Putschversuch der Groschengarde vereitelt.
description.italian: Hai impedito alla Guardia del Conio di fare un colpo di stato
description.polish: Udało ci się zapobiec przewrotowi Strażników Denara
description.schinese: 你阻止了钱币守卫团发起政变
description.spanish: Has impedido el intento de golpe de Estado de la Guardia de la Moneda

description.brazilian: Você teve que matar o amigo traidor
description.english: You had to kill the friend who betrayed you
description.french: Vous avez dû tuer l'ami qui vous avait trahi
description.german: Du musstest den Freund töten, der dich verraten hat.
description.italian: Hai dovuto uccidere l'amico che ti ha tradito
description.polish: Zabito przyjaciela, który okazał się zdrajcą
description.schinese: 你不得不杀死了背叛自己的朋友
description.spanish: Has tenido que matar al amigo que te había traicionado

displayName.english: In the name of the Enlightened

description.brazilian: Você decidiu salvar Thélème do golpe da Guarda
description.english: You have decided to save Thélème from the Guard's coup
description.french: Vous avez décidé de sauver Thélème du coup d'état de la Garde
description.german: Du hast beschlossen, Thélème vor dem Putsch der Garde zu retten.
description.italian: Hai deciso di salvare Thélème dal colpo di stato della Guardia
description.schinese: 你决定从守卫团的政变中解救泰勒玛
description.spanish: Has decidido salvar Thélème del golpe de Estado de la Guardia

description.brazilian: Você decidiu salvar a Aliança do golpe da Guarda
description.english: You have decided to save the Alliance from the Guard's coup
description.french: Vous avez décidé de sauver l'Alliance du coup d'état de la Garde
description.german: Du hast beschlossen, die Allianz vor dem Putsch der Garde zu retten.
description.italian: Hai deciso di salvare l'Alleanza dal colpo di stato della Guardia
description.russian: Спасти колонию Мостового альянса от захвата.
description.schinese: 你决定从守卫团的政变中解救联盟
description.spanish: Has decidido salvar a la Alianza del golpe de Estado de la Guardia

description.brazilian: Você passou no teste de Glendan
description.english: You have passed Glendan's test
description.french: Vous avez réussi l'épreuve imposée par Glendan
description.german: Du hast Glendans Prüfung des Wassers bestanden.
description.italian: Hai superato la prova di Glendan
description.polish: Udało ci się przejść próbę Glendana
description.schinese: 你通过了格兰丹的测试
description.spanish: Has pasado la prueba de Glendan

displayName.french: Hors de la prison de pierre
displayName.german: Die Flucht aus dem steinernen Gefängnis
displayName.spanish: Fuera de la prisión de piedra

description.brazilian: Você libertou Constantin das garras de Vinbarr
description.english: You have freed Constantin from the claws of Vinbarr
description.french: Vous avez libéré Constantin des griffes de Vinbarr
description.german: Du hast Constantin aus den Klauen von Vinbarr befreit.
description.italian: Hai liberato Constantin dalle grinfie di Vinbarr
description.polish: Udało ci się uwolnić Constantina ze szponów Vinbarra
description.schinese: 你从芬巴尔的手中解救了康斯坦丁
description.spanish: Has liberado a Constantin de las garras de Vinbarr

description.brazilian: Você influenciou a eleição para coroar seu favorito como grão-soberano
description.english: You have influenced the election to make your favourite become high-king.
description.french: Vous avez influencé l'élection pour que votre favori devienne haut-roi.
description.german: Du hast die Wahl beeinflusst, damit dein Favorit zum Hochkönig wird.
description.italian: Hai influenzato le elezioni per far incoronare il tuo Gran Sovrano preferito.
description.polish: Udało ci się wpłynąć na wybór i przeforsować swojego faworyta na Wielkiego Króla
description.russian: Помочь своему фавориту стать верховным королём.
description.schinese: 你影响了选举，让自己偏爱的人当选至高王。
description.spanish: Has influido en la elección para que tu favorito se convierta en alto rey

description.brazilian: Você entrou no santuário e falou com En on míl frichtimen
description.english: You entered the shrine and spoke to En on míl frichtimen
description.french: Vous êtes entré dans le sanctuaire et avez parlé à En on míl frichtimen
description.german: Du hast den Schrein betreten und mit En on míl frichtimen gesprochen.
description.italian: Hai varcato l'ingresso del santuario e parlato con En on míl frichtimen
description.polish: Udało ci się wejść do świątyni i porozmawiać z En on míl frichtimen
description.russian: Войти в святилище и поговорить с en on míl frichtimen.
description.schinese: 你进入了神庙并与En on míl frichtimen交谈
description.spanish: Has entrado en el santuario y has hablado con en on míl frichtimen

displayName.french: Il y a quelque chose de pourri

description.brazilian: Você descobriu as ações de Constantin
description.english: You have discovered Constantin's actions
description.french: Vous avez découvert les agissements de Constantin
description.italian: Hai scoperto le azioni di Constantin
description.polish: Udało ci się odkryć knowania Constantina
description.schinese: 你发现了康斯坦丁的行动
description.spanish: Has descubierto las artimañas de Constantin

displayName.brazilian: Um por todos, todos por um!
displayName.english: All for one, one for all!
displayName.french: Un pour tous, tous pour un !
displayName.german: Einer für alle, alle für einen!
displayName.italian: Uno per tutti, tutti per uno!
displayName.polish: Jeden za wszystkich, wszyscy za jednego!
displayName.russian: Один за всех и все за одного
displayName.spanish: ¡Uno para todos y todos para uno!

description.brazilian: Você conseguiu unir todas as facções contra Constantin
description.english: You managed to unite all factions against Constantin
description.french: Vous avez réussi à unir toutes les factions contre Constantin
description.german: Du hast es geschafft, alle Fraktionen gegen Constantin zu vereinen.
description.italian: Hai unito tutte le fazioni contro Constantin
description.polish: Udało ci się zjednoczyć wszystkie frakcje przeciwko Constantinowi
description.schinese: 你成功使全部派别联合起来对抗康斯坦丁
description.spanish: Has conseguido unir a todas las facciones contra Constantin

description.brazilian: Você conseguiu reconciliar todas as facções e restaurou o equilíbrio
description.english: You have managed to reconcile all the factions and restore balance
description.french: Vous avez réussi l'exploit de concilier toutes les factions et de ramener l'équilibre
description.german: Du hast es geschafft, alle Fraktionen zu versöhnen und das Gleichgewicht wiederherzustellen.
description.italian: Hai riconciliato tutte le fazioni e riportato l'equilibrio
description.polish: Udało ci się pogodzić wszystkie frakcje i przywrócić równowagę
description.russian: Примирить все фракции и восстановить равновесие.
description.schinese: 你已成功让所有派别和解并恢复平衡
description.spanish: Has conseguido reconciliar a todas las facciones y restablecer el equilibrio

description.brazilian: Você decidiu abandonar o velho continente à triste sina dele
description.english: You have decided to abandon the old continent to its sad fate
description.french: Vous avez décidé d'abandonner le vieux continent à son triste sort
description.german: Du hast beschlossen, den alten Kontinent seinem traurigen Schicksal zu überlassen.
description.italian: Hai deciso di abbandonare il vecchio continente alla sua triste sorte
description.polish: Pozostawiono stary kontynent swojemu smutnemu losowi
description.schinese: 你已决定抛弃旧大陆，使其承受悲惨命运
description.spanish: Has decidido abandonar el viejo continente a su triste suerte

displayName.brazilian: Um grande passo em direção à paz
displayName.french: Un grand pas vers la paix
displayName.german: Ein großer Schritt in Richtung Frieden
displayName.italian: Un grande passo verso la pace
displayName.spanish: Un gran paso hacia la paz

description.brazilian: Você escolheu o equilíbrio, mas sente falta de alguns aliados
description.english: You have chosen balance, but you miss some of your allies
description.french: Vous avez choisi l'équilibre mais certains alliés vous manquent
description.german: Du hast dich für das Gleichgewicht entschieden, aber du vermisst einige deiner Verbündeten.
description.italian: Hai scelto l'equilibrio, ma hai perso alcuni alleati
description.polish: Wybrano równowagę kosztem utraty niektórych sojuszników
description.russian: Восстановить равновесие ценой жизни своих союзников.
description.schinese: 你选择平衡在二者之间，但仍想念一些盟友
description.spanish: Has elegido el equilibrio, pero echas de menos a algunos de tus aliados

description.brazilian: Você favoreceu o velho mundo em detrimento das suas raízes
description.english: You have favoured the old world at the expense of your roots
description.french: Vous avez favorisé le vieux monde aux dépends de vos racines
description.german: Du hast der alten Welt auf Kosten deiner Wurzeln den Vorrang gegeben.
description.italian: Hai preferito il vecchio mondo a scapito delle tue radici
description.polish: Wybrano stary świat kosztem własnych korzeni
description.schinese: 你牺牲了自己的血统之根，转而偏爱旧世界
description.spanish: Has favorecido el viejo mundo a expensas de tus raíces

description.brazilian: Você se tornou um dos novos deuses da ilha ao lado de Constantin
description.english: You have become one of the new deities of the island alongside Constantin
description.french: Vous êtes devenu une des nouvelles divinités de l'île aux côtés de Constantin
description.german: Du bist mit Constantin zu einer der neuen Gottheiten der Insel geworden.
description.italian: Ora sei una delle nuove divinità dell'isola assieme a Constantin
description.polish: Wybrano przymierze z Constantinem, stając się nowym bóstwem wyspy
description.russian: Стать одним из новых божеств острова вместе с Константином.
description.schinese: 你已和康斯坦丁一起成为岛上新的神明
description.spanish: Te has convertido en una de las nuevas deidades de la isla junto a Constantin

description.brazilian: Completar o jogo no modo extremo

description.french: Finir le jeu en mode extrême

description.italian: Finisci il gioco in modalità estrema
description.russian: Пройти игру на экстремальном уровне сложности.
description.schinese: 在极限模式下完成游戏
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo extremo
